titles.title: Congratulating the Tampa Bay Buccaneers for winning Super Bowl XXXVII.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Putnam moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 31.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/29/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the House on January 27, 2003. The digest of that version is repeated here.)Congratulates the World Champion Tampa Bay Buccaneers for their victory in Super Bowl XXXVII.
